item.title: Best Stocks: A rare retailer makes the list as its 'treasure hunting' mojo outruns tariff threat
item.description: There are a lot of consumer discretionary names on The Best Stocks list, but very few actual retailers because of the structural issues with the secto...

item.title: Two stocks that could win from Apple's U.S. manufacturing effort pushed by Trump
item.description: Named as strategic partners in Apple's plan to invest $600 billion domestically over a four-year period, these two stocks could benefit.

item.title: This marketing platform stock has more room to run after strong earnings, says Citigroup
item.description: Shares have advanced nearly 19% so far this week alone. The firm's second-quarter earnings and revenue surpassed analysts' estimates on Wednesday.

item.title: Nvidia gets price target hike from Goldman Sachs ahead of earnings
item.description: Shares have advanced nearly 34% in 2025. Nvidia will report results on Aug. 27 after the closing bell.

item.title: This residential solar stock can more than double from here, says JPMorgan
item.description: JPMorgan reiterated an overweight rating on the solar stock and raised its price target.
